title: Canyonlands National Park: Education Internships
body: Education Internships        Outdoor education instructor with a local school group NPS Photo by Neal Herbert   Â    Great teaching experiences are available in canyon country. If you like children and enjoy working in the outdoors, a Canyon Country Outdoor Education internship is the position for you. The following internships are available during spring and fall: Arches/Grand County Internship [19k PDF file] Canyonlands/San Juan Elementary Internship [78k PDF file]
